justification: The portfolio is constructed based on ETFs with the strongest bullish momentum signals, as indicated by RSI values above 60 suggesting upward trends and no conflicting MACD or EMA data. XLF.P has a positive MACD histogram and RSI near 60, suggesting upward momentum. XLP.P and XLU.P show positive MACD histograms and RSI above 50, indicating stable uptrends. XLB.P has a slightly positive MACD histogram and neutral RSI, offering balanced exposure. I allocated higher weights to XLF.P and XLP.P due to clearer bullish signals.
